subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: A day after Rafael Nadal’s defeat, Andy Murray, another member of tennis’s so-called Big 4, fell to Grigor Dimitrov, a rising Bulgarian, in straight sets in the Wimbledon quarterfinals.
snippet: A day after Rafael Nadal’s defeat, Andy Murray, another member of tennis’s so-called Big 4, fell to Grigor Dimitrov, a rising Bulgarian, in straight sets in the Wimbledon quarterfinals.
